    The Chattanooga Guides Series

    Woodcraft Classes : Pen Turning 101: The Basics

    When: 2025-07-03 (Wednesday)
    Time: 6 PM - 9 PM
    Venue: Woodcraft of Chattanooga
    Address: 5824 Brainerd Road, Chattanooga, TN 37411
    Entrance Fee: TBD
    Event Website
    #woodworking#skill-development#craft
    Join Bill LaRoque for a hands-on intro to pen turning using a lathe. This beginner-friendly class covers essential lathe parts, safe operating practices, and step-by-step guidance for shaping your first pen. You'll prep your wooden blank, learn turning techniques, apply a smooth finish, and leave with a handcrafted pen to keep or gift.
